front.title: Hybrid Subscription for Multicast Reciever Mobility in MIPv6

abstract.t: In MIPv6 specification, there are two basic methods for mobilemulticast: 1) via a bi-directional tunnel from MN to its HomeAgent;2) via a local multicast router on the foreign link beingvisited. In this memo, a hybrid method is introduced. MN subscribesmulticast service through Home agent at first. Then, MN changes itssubscription router to a local multicast router which can provide thesame multicast service.
